Class BossFactory

java.lang.Object
application.model.boss.BossFactory
public class BossFactory extends Object
Creates the appropriate Boss subclass for each stage number (1–10). The caller receives a Boss reference without knowing the concrete type. Stage-to-Boss mapping: 
   Stage  1–2  → SlimeBoss     (easy)
   Stage  3–5  → SkeletonBoss  (medium)
   Stage  6–8  → GolemBoss     (hard)
   Stage  9–10 → DragonBoss    (hardest)
Health scaling formula: maxHealth = BASE_HEALTH + (stage * HEALTH_PER_STAGE) where BASE_HEALTH = 5 and HEALTH_PER_STAGE = 3. This means Stage 1 = 8 HP, Stage 5 = 20 HP, Stage 10 = 35 HP.

  • Method Details

    • createBoss

      public static Boss createBoss(int stage)
      Creates a Boss for the given stage number.
      Parameters:
      stage - the stage number (1–10)
      Returns:
      a new Boss instance appropriate for the given stage
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if stage is outside the valid range
